data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 14,000 souls in São Miguel and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of São Miguel, Cape Verde

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of São Miguel, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in São Miguel, Cape Verde.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, we pray for the believers in São Miguel, Cape Verde to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in São Miguel, Cape Verde that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Calheta
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Calheta, São Miguel, Cape Verde.
Spirit, teach the 1,171 believers in São Miguel that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of São Miguel. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in São Miguel, Cape Verde to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
